name: ractive-gauge
description: A simple UV-type meter for Ractive
author: David Konsumer <konsumer@jetboystudio.com>

scripts.js: browserify . -x ractive --standalone gauge -o dist/ractive-gauge.js && uglifyjs dist/ractive-gauge.js -o dist/ractive-gauge.min.js
scripts.bump: npm run js && git add dist/ && git commit -am 'build' && mversion patch -m && npm publish
